title: High-resolution electron cryomicroscopy of V-ATPase in native synaptic vesicles | Science
content: Intercellular communication in the nervous system occurs through the release of neurotransmitters into the synaptic cleft between neurons. In the presynaptic neuron, the proton pumping vesicular- or vacuolar-type ATPase (V-ATPase) powers neurotransmitter ...
